title: ReturnOfNights Mega Game Pack ISO (v1.23) ppGames
description:
ReturnOfNights Mega Games Pack 1.23 - Combining the best of MGP1 2 and 3 into one ppGames DVD.

Allowing installing games to any drive with full res Screen Shots with Descriptions and sorted in categories.

Reintegrate previously installed games into your new OS and the start menu.

Use the Launcher to pick your games with the same features found in the Installer.

348 Games, all pre cracked and ready to run.

Builder tools and backup tools to create your own game packs or just add your favorite games to your ppGame collection.

All the latest cracks, un-wrappers, and keygens for the best brand named games.

Enjoy the faster install speeds and more games per DVD with ppGames technologies.

This pack integrates perfectly with MGP4/LastXP - Sorting of Start menu is limited to LastXP (so upgrade now ;))

(Note: if you use a LastXP disk in a non LastXP machine and pick a menu sorting method from the Settings or ssWPI then the games will sort) 

RON

As ALWAYS VISIT US @ WWW.APPZPOINT.NET:
http://appzpoint.net/vb/showthread.php?t=49134

******** DOWNLOADS ********

(NOTE: Don't Download this to a FAT32 partition, it wont handle files >4 gig)

ISO Size: 4.32 GB

MD5#: 58040e653c2c3bb20bf0d9781558beb9

ED2K:
